name: Vandaag's V.O.C. Grog
description: Coconut milk serves as the structure, while the butter creates a rich canvas for spice, pumpkin, and rhum agricole; the result is something like a pumpkin spice muffin, but in rich, comforting drinkable form.
recipeIngredient: 4 ounces coconut milk, such as Silk Coconut

recipeInstructions.text: For the "batter": In a small bowl, blend garam masala, slightly softened butter, and brown sugar together until well-combined.
For each drink: In saucepan over medium heat, stir garam masala "batter," coconut milk, and pumpkin purée together until warm. Take off heat, pour into cup, and add rhum agricole blanc.

*To make your own pumpkin purée, optional: Roast pumpkin at 350° until soft. Let cool and then dice. For every 2 cups diced pumpkin, add 1/4 cup cream and pinch of salt and purée in blender or food processer until smooth.
